static member FieldAwareFactorizationMachine : Microsoft.ML.BinaryClassificationCatalog.BinaryClassificationTrainers * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<bool> * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Vector<single>[] * Action<Microsoft.ML.Trainers.FieldAwareFactorizationMachineModelParameters> -> ValueTuple<Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<single>, Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<bool>>

Docs.param: The binary classifier catalog trainer object.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the model that was trained. The type of the model is . Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.summary: Predict a target using a field-aware factorization machine.
